to make somebody/yourself anxious about somebody/something
the state of worrying about something

worse.def: of poorer quality or lower standard; less good or more unpleasant
used to introduce a statement about something that is more serious or unpleasant than things already mentioned

worship.def: the practice of showing respect for God or a god, by saying prayers, singing with others, etc.; a ceremony for this
to show respect for God or a god, especially by saying prayers, singing, etc. with other people in a religious building
to go to a service in a religious building
to love and admire somebody very much, especially so much that you cannot see their faults

worst.def: of the poorest quality or lowest standard; worse than any other person or thing of a similar kind
the most serious or unpleasant thing that could happen; the part, situation, possibility, etc. that is worse than any other

worth.def: having a value in money, etc.
used to recommend the action mentioned because you think it may be useful, enjoyable, etc.
important, good or enjoyable enough to make somebody feel satisfied, especially when difficulty or effort is involved

would.def: used as the past form of will when reporting what somebody has said or thought
used for talking about the result of an event that you imagine
used for describing a possible action or event that did not in fact happen, because something else did not happen first
used for saying why somebody does something
used for saying what you want to happen
used to show that somebody/something was not willing or refused to do something
used to ask somebody politely to do something
used in polite offers or invitations
used to say what you like, love, hate, etc.
used to give opinions that you are not certain about
used for talking about things that often happened in the past

wound1.def: an injury to part of the body, especially one in which a hole is made in the skin using a weapon
mental or emotional pain caused by something unpleasant that has been said or done to you
to injure part of the body, especially by making a hole in the skin using a weapon

wounded.def: injured by a weapon, for example in a war

wrap.def: to cover something completely in paper or other material, for example when you are giving it as a present
to cover something/somebody in material, for example in order to protect it/them
to put something firmly around something/somebody

write.def: to make letters or numbers on a surface, especially using a pen or a pencil
to produce something in written form so that people can read, perform or use it, etc.
to put information, a message of good wishes, etc. in a letter and send it to somebody
to state the information or the words mentioned
to put information in the appropriate places on a cheque or other form

write back.def: to write somebody a letter replying to their letter

write down.def: to write something on paper, especially in order to remember or record it

writer.def: a person whose job is writing books, stories, articles, etc.
a person who has written a particular thing
a person who forms letters in a particular way when they are writing

writing.def: the activity of writing, in contrast to reading, speaking, etc.
the activity of writing books, articles, etc., especially as a job
a group of pieces of writing, especially by a particular person or on a particular subject
words that have been written or painted on something
the particular way in which somebody forms letters when they write

written.def: expressed in writing rather than in speech
involving writing rather than speaking or practical skills
in the form of a letter, document, etc. and therefore official

wrong.def: causing problems or difficulties; not as it should be
not suitable, right or what you need
in a way that produces a result that is not correct or that you do not want

yard.def: an area outside a building, usually with a hard surface and a surrounding wall
a piece of land next to or around your house where you can grow flowers, fruit, vegetables, etc., usually with a lawn (= an area of grass)
an area of land used for a special purpose or business
a unit for measuring length, equal to 3 feet (36 inches) or 0.9144 of a metre

yawn.def: to open your mouth wide and breathe in deeply through it, usually because you are tired or bored

year.def: the period from 1 January to 31 December, that is 365 or 366 days, divided into 12 months
a period of 12 months, measured from any particular time
a period of 12 months connected with a particular activity

yellow.def: having the colour of lemons or butter
the colour of lemons or butter

yes.def: used to answer a question and say that something is correct or true
used to show that you agree with what has been said
used to disagree with something negative that somebody has just said
used to agree to a request or to give permission
used to accept an offer or invitation
used for asking somebody what they want
used for replying politely when somebody calls you
used to show that you have just remembered something
used to encourage somebody to continue speaking
used to show that you do not believe what somebody has said
used to emphasize what you have just said
used to show that you are excited or extremely pleased about something that you have done or something that has happened
an answer that shows that you agree with an idea, a statement, etc.; a person who says ‘yes’

yet.def: used in negative sentences and questions to talk about something that has not happened but that you expect to happen
from now until the period of time mentioned has passed
the best, longest, etc. thing of its kind made, produced, written, etc. until now/then
used to emphasize an increase in number or amount or the number of times something happens
despite what has just been said

you.def: used as the subject or object of a verb or after a preposition to refer to the person or people being spoken or written to
used with nouns and adjectives to speak to somebody directly
used for referring to people in general

young.def: having lived or existed for only a short time; not fully developed
not yet old; not as old as others
consisting of young people or young children; with a low average age
young people considered as a group
young animals of a particular type or that belong to a particular mother

your.def: of or belonging to the person or people being spoken or written to
of or belonging to people in general

yours.def: used at the end of a letter before signing your name

yourself.def: used when the person or people being spoken to both cause and are affected by an action
used to emphasize the fact that the person who is being spoken to is doing something

youth.def: the time of life when a person is young, especially the time before a child becomes an adult
the quality or state of being young
young people considered as a group

zero.def: a temperature, pressure, etc. that is equal to zero on a scale
the lowest possible amount or level; nothing at all

zone.def: an area or a region with a particular feature or use
one of the areas that a larger area is divided into for the purpose of organization
